channel.title: How to remove the RS logo from my client
channel.description: How do I remove the old Runescape logo from my client, even if it removes the flames too, but i would rather just remove the logo. if you dont know what i mean its a 317 client and i edited my title screen but the flames and "RuneScape" keep showing up over my title screen and I cant see my design. How do I go about this?

item.title: How to remove the RS logo from my client
item.dc:creator: @dagger9090 dagger9090
item.description:
@dagger9090 wrote:

I got it thanks! ;D

Read full topic

item.title: How to remove the RS logo from my client
item.dc:creator: @dagger9090 dagger9090
item.description:
@dagger9090 wrote:

it has nothing to do with the picture, its the logo that goes over your title.png, its the oldschool runescape logo, i could change and edit the title screen 10 times and it wouldnt make a difference. i need to know how to get rid of the logo/flames, the flames can stay though that doesnt matter
and what is toms cache. go further into detail please.

Read full topic
